get.summary: To get the metric dropdown data
get.operationId: To get the metric dropdown data

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type=empty gives all results, type = 1 gives the result category wise and type = 2 gives result where metric_category_id is null in database

parameters.name: metric_type
parameters.description: metric_type=empty gives all results, metric_type = 1 single and metric_type = 2 calculation

parameters.name: metric_category_id
parameters.description: metric_category_id is required when you assign type = 1

parameters.description: metric_category_id is required when you assign type = 1
